Author: eyjafjallafuckyall
Text: Dude I feel this 100%. I have had friends tell me that they know about my issues and are willing to listen to me talk whenever, or even be a shoulder to cry on, but I just cannot make myself do it. However, at the risk of sounding hypocritical, I think you should open up if you can muster up the courage to do so. You will probably feel so much better afterwards. If not, feel free to message me if you ever need to talk/rant?

Author: imnotverycreative685
Text: Can you talk to a therapist? Or maybe preface that you’re not ready for recovery but need to vent and talk things out to someone you trust? Just keep in mind that they are human and may not react in a way you want, but they are probably trying their best❤️
